code: import{CardRow}from'./cardRow/CardRow.js';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{selectBoard}from'./boardSlice.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Board=function Board(){var currentBoard=useSelector(selectBoard);var numberOfCards=currentBoard.length;var columns=3;var rows=Math.floor(numberOfCards/columns);var getRowCards=function getRowCards(row){var rowCards=[];for(var j=0;j<columns;j++){var cardIndex=row*columns+j;rowCards.push(currentBoard[cardIndex]);}return rowCards;};var content=[];for(var row=0;row<rows;row++){var rowCards=getRowCards(row);content.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardRow,{cards:rowCards},row));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards-container",children:content});};
